meanings.definition: Enlists: to join or enroll in a cause or organization
meanings.sent1: She enlists in the school club to help others.
meanings.sent2: He enlists in the charity to make a difference.
meanings.sent3: The cat enlists in the neighborhood watch to protect against mice.
meanings.sent4: The sun enlists its rays to warm the earth.
meanings.sent5: The hero enlists the townspeople to fight the dragon.

meanings.definition: Enlists: to secure the support or help of someone
meanings.sent1: The teacher enlists the students to clean up the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The manager enlists the team to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The clown enlists the audience to laugh at his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The captain enlists the crew to navigate through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The coach enlists the players to work together for victory.

meanings.definition: Enlists: to sign up for military service
meanings.sent1: He enlists in the army to serve his country.
meanings.sent2: She enlists in the navy to travel the world.
meanings.sent3: The dog enlists in the K-9 unit to sniff out treats.
meanings.sent4: The tree enlists its roots to anchor it firmly in the ground.
meanings.sent5: The knight enlists in the king's army to protect the realm.
